subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
Television
lead_paragraph: Mr. Sabol, a producer, writer, director and cameraman, took his father’s idea and, through cinematic ingenuity, helped propel the National Football League’s enormous popularity.
snippet: Mr. Sabol, a producer, writer, director and cameraman, took his father’s idea and, through cinematic ingenuity, helped propel the National Football League’s enormous popularity.
